execution_plan.description: Extract customers from the central users DB: customer id, email and country (only rows with an email).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customer_id AS customer_id, email_address AS email, country FROM customers WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Extract customers from the EU sales DB: customer id, email and country (only rows with an email).
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS customer_id, email, country FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Extract customers from the US sales DB: customer id, email and country (only rows with an email).
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS customer_id, email, country FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
